title: Call Lightning
content:
Call Lightning Level 3 Conjuration Spell 3~30 Damage 3d10Lightning Lightning strikes all targets within range. Then for 10 turns, you can call down lightning again without expending a spell slot. 10 turns On Save: Targets still take half damage. 18m DEX Save Concentration Action Level 3 Spell Slot
